sub_topic: Solving optimization problems using whale optimization algorithm.
message_1:

The production process requires two raw materials X and Y, with available quantities of 3500 units and 4800 units, respectively. The production of one unit of product A requires 5 units of material X and 4 units of material Y, while the production of one unit of product B requires 4 units of material X and 6 units of material Y.

Formulate an optimization problem that maximizes the total revenue while taking into account the constraints on available raw materials. Solve the problem using the whale optimization algorithm, and determine the optimal production quantities for products A and B that will maximize the company's revenue.
